name: The Elite League Podcast with Greg Carlson

episodes.title: How I Escaped a Cult and Built a Brand Rooted in Love & Freedom - with Drew Tacher
episodes.description:
Drew’s journey is one of those stories that makes you pause and reconsider everything you thought you knew about success and trauma.

In this episode, Drew gets brutally honest about his past — growing up in a cult, working multiple jobs as a kid, and fighting to break out of generational cycles. He shares how trauma shaped his work ethic, how he built and scaled multiple companies, and now launched a brand that’s turning healing into streetwear.

This is for anyone who’s been through hell and still dreams of building something great.
